str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To send, transmit, permit to go, put forth.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Working, action, productive work, activity; in the NT, confined to superhuman activity. From energes; efficiency.
Feminine of planos; objectively, fraudulence; subjectively, a straying from orthodoxy or piety.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From pistis; to have faith, i.e. Credit; by implication, to entrust.
A lie, falsehood, untruth; false religion. From pseudomai; a falsehood.
